inclusion.criterion: clinically and radiologically diagnosed with acute cholecystitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones

exclusion.criterion: acute pancreatitis, cholangitis or choledochal stone with acute cholecystitis
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones (no mention of pancreatitis)

exclusion.criterion: having a previous history of upper abdominal surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is an obese woman with epigastric tenderness and tenderness in the right upper quadrant without rebound. Laboratory analysis shows elevated ESR and leukocytosis with a left shift.
